name: God Mode (itch) (Benjamin Rose, Nicolas Vogelbusch)
description:
This small game is part of the course "Game a Week". As the name suggests we made this in a week. The objective is to find the correct planets and destroy them (by clicking on them).

Our focus was trying out Modularity.

Made by: Benjamin Rose, Nicolas Vogelbusch

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game a Week"  (WinterSemester 2019/20)
